definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: It looks like the momentum is growing for a shift towards stream-oriented approach to UI.
sentences.chinese: 看起來UI轉向面向數據流方式的勢頭漸勁。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於從不確定傳感器數據流中獲得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: This is why RLE is not very effective on non repetitive streams.
sentences.chinese: 這就是RLE對於非重複數據流並非有效的原因。

sentences.english: This paper introduced a density grid-based data stream clustering algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於密度網格的數據流聚類算法。

sentences.english: A method of data-flow test based on infeasible path is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 給出了在不可達路徑影響下的數據流測試方法。

sentences.english: Returns logical name of this batch data stream.
sentences.chinese: 返回此批處理數據流的邏輯名稱。

sentences.english: It can provide the course arrangement system and teaching administration system with basic data.
sentences.chinese: 爲排課系統和教務管理系統提供基本的數據流等。

sentences.english: Even with multiple vertex streams, all streams are indexed together.
sentences.chinese: 即使對於多數據流，所有數據流都使用相同的索引。

sentences.english: Even with multiple vertex streams, all streams are indexed together.
sentences.chinese: 即使對於多數據流，所有數據流都使用相同的索引。

sentences.english: This section focuses on problems around the modeling of data flows.
sentences.chinese: 這一部分重點關注與數據流建模有關的問題。

sentences.chinese: 解碼節目數據流，並輸入到電視機中。

sentences.english: The control dependency information of class cluster is the foundation of inter-class dataflow testing.
sentences.chinese: 類簇控制依賴信息是進行類間數據流測試的基礎。

sentences.english: The result of this algorithm eliminates a lot of redundant information and improves the precise array data-flow analysis technique.
sentences.chinese: 精確的數組數據流分析是並行編譯技術中的重要步驟。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present a multi-stream sub-band method for noisy speech recognition.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種噪聲下的多數據流子帶語音識別方法。

sentences.english: Decide whenever possible for a pure control-flow or a pure data-flow model.
sentences.chinese: 判斷是否有可能採用一個純控制流或純數據流的模型。

sentences.english: because the entire data stream for the file arrives in a single packet.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這個文件的數據流是在一個單獨的包內到達。
